com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table

Class AbstractRowModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.developmentontheedge.beans.swing.table.AbstractRowModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RowModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRowModel

    public abstract class AbstractRowModel
extends Object
implements RowModel
    This abstract class takes care of management of the listeners and provides some convenience methods for generating RowModelEvent and dispatching them to the listeners.

    To create a concrete RowModel as a sublcass of AbstractRowModel you need provide implementations for the following two methods: 

      public int size();
  public int getBean(int row);

      Constructor and Description
      AbstractRowModel() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
      Adds a listener to the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.
      void fireTableChanged(RowModelEvent e)
      Forwards the given notification event to all * RowModelListeners that registered themselves as listeners for this table model.
      void fireTableDataChanged()
      Notifies all listeners that all property values may have been changed.
      void fireTableRowsDeleted(int firstRow, int lastRow)
      Notifies all the listeners that rows (beans) in the range [firstRow, lastRow], inclusive, have been deleted.
      void fireTableRowsInserted(int firstRow, int lastRow)
      Notifies all listeners that rows (beans) in the range [firstRow, lastRow], inclusive, have been inserted.
      void fireTableRowsUpdated(int firstRow, int lastRow)
      Notifies all the listeners that rows (beans) in the range [firstRow, lastRow], inclusive, have been updated.
      Class getBeanClass()
      Returns class of first bean on row model or if it is empty returns Object.class.
      EventListener[] getListeners(Class listenerType)
      Returns an array of all the listeners of the given type that were added to this model.
      void removeRowModelListener(RowModelListener l)
      Removes a listener from the list that's notified each time a change to the data model occurs.

      • getListeners

        public EventListener[] getListeners(Class listenerType)

      • fireTableDataChanged

        public void fireTableDataChanged()
        Notifies all listeners that all property values may have been changed. The number of beans may also have been changed and the TabularPropertyInspector should redraw the table from scratch.
        See Also:
        RowModelEvent, EventListenerList

      • fireTableRowsInserted

        public void fireTableRowsInserted(int firstRow,
                                  int lastRow)
        Notifies all listeners that rows (beans) in the range [firstRow, lastRow], inclusive, have been inserted.
        Parameters:
        firstRow - the first row
        lastRow - the last row
        See Also:
        RowModelEvent, EventListenerList
